title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, mix eggs and grated Pecorino Romano cheese.
Fry the pancetta or bacon until crispy.
Combine the cooked pasta with the pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and salt to taste.
Serve hot with additional cheese if desired.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, and spices.
